title: Entrepreneurship
summary: Entrepreneurship is the creation or extraction of economic value in ways that generally entail beyond the minimal amount of risk. An entrepreneur is an individual who creates and/or invests in businesses, bearing most of the risks and enjoying most of the rewards. Entrepreneurs are commonly seen as innovators, sources of new ideas, goods, services, and business procedures.

factual.claim: By the time they reach their retirement years, half of all working men in the United States probably have a period of self-employment
Entrepreneurs are individuals who build their own personal brand of creativity
Ethnic entrepreneurship refers to self-employed business owners who belong to racial or ethnic minority groups

interpretive.statement: Entrepreneurship as a dynamic, evolving economic concept
Entrepreneurship is a multifaceted phenomenon beyond mere business creation
Entrepreneurs as innovators and sources of new ideas
